channel.title: CVE Feed for WPDeveloper -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPDeveloper -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-46809|2024-09-04T18:29:46.550Z -- wpdeveloper -- reviewx%20%E2%80%93%20multi-criteria%20rating%20%26%20reviews%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Formula Elements in a CSV File vulnerability in WPDeveloper ReviewX – Multi-criteria Rating & Reviews for WooCommerce.This issue affects ReviewX – Multi-criteria Rating & Reviews for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-43936|2024-08-29T18:17:27.562Z -- wpdeveloper -- embedpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper EmbedPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects EmbedPress: from n/a through 4.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-43328|2024-08-19T19:26:35.332Z -- wpdeveloper -- embedpress
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WPDeveloper EmbedPress allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects EmbedPress: from n/a through 4.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-43129|2024-08-13T10:54:06.386Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.5.8.
